DOC.brief_title: Radiofrequency Microtenotomy Treatment Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: Rotator cuff tendinosis cause pain disability shoulder . Tendinosis , sometimes complicate partial rupture , appear major lesion chronic rotator cuff tendinopathy . Important feature poor intrinsic ability heal . Several patient receive treatment shoulder tendinosis year . Conservative treatment option include rest , stretch , strengthen , ice and/or physical therapy use difference result . A traditional surgical treatment ( acromioplasty ) report variable results.. The aim study evaluate improvement VAS functionality use Constant score treatment rotator cuff tendinosis use radiofrequency-plasma base microtenotomy comparison traditional acromioplasty physical therapy .
